data.name: Hello Again
data.detailed_description:
Hello Again is a puzzling adventure game where you'll explore ancient ruins and uncover the secrets of a mysterious time loop. That's a lot of responsibility, especially for an unpaid intern.

A Strange Internship

Archaeology intern Geoffrey just arrived on Mychaea, a ruin-covered island whose original inhabitants were known for inventing ancient timepieces. The island's head archaeologist, Weston, recently went missing under strange circumstances. Even stranger, the island is caught up in a never-ending time loop, and Geoffrey is the only one aware of it.

A Mysterious Island

What lies inside the northern temple? How do you work these ancient terminals? What are all these strange murals for? And why can this dog talk???

A Quirky Cast of Characters

Talk with Stew, part-time philosopher and full-time chill dude. Impress Chauncey, famed equestrian perfumist. Pet Theodore, the aforementioned talking dog. But whatever you do, do NOT flirt with Lois. She is not a fan.

data.short_description: Hello Again is a time-looping mystery game set on an island filled with ancient ruins. Explore the island, solve puzzles, and interact with quirky townsfolk to uncover the island's secrets and break the loop.
